page.title: 03FARMING -CROPS
page.content: Agriculture is the dominant land use in this area.Land quality falls into the top categories of{A+,A,B+,B}making this a prime arable and mixed farming area.Crops grown during 1985 include {WINTER }and {SPRING BARLEY ,WINTER {WHEAT, OATS, FIELD VEGETABLES,GRASS} (For HAY and SILAGE) and newer crops of{OILSEED RAPE}and{PROTEIN PEAS.} Winter sown crops are proving to be more profitable and also have the advantage of spreading the farmers' workload more evenly throughout the year. The heavy E.E.C. subsidies on protein peas,oilseed rape and in the near future,lupins,has encouraged the growth of these crops. Recent fluctuations in prices for wheat and barley are a further incentive to their growth.
